items.raw_string: Until 22 June 2017, Chairman of the Mindful Policy Group Trading Ltd, a commercial company with a charitable arm which aims to advance the science of attachment through training, conferences and publications. The role was unremunerated but I held an equity stake in the company. (Registered 26 May 2013; updated 27 June 2017)
